message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with. A fair and simple proposal.
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Your turn to counter.
You're trying to lowball me, I'll meet you in the middle. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. Don't get too comfortable.
You're not budging, I'll try to get a bit more. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving in yet. I want to keep the upper hand.
You're still holding out, I'll try to get closer to the middle. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
